hobbies: sewing, crafting, and spending time with family
goals: to raise happy children, to open her own Etsy store, and to eventually return to work part-time
challenges: to balance household duties and raising a family, to find self-fulfillment while dedicating time to children, and to find affordable childcare
motivations: to create a loving home, to express creativity, and to foster independence in her children
fears: to not be a good mother, to not succeed in her online store, and to not be able to afford childcare
